items.sentence: It was impossible to come up with a really satisfactory solution.
I was surprised when Tom told me that he didn\'t want to do that.
I wasn\'t going to sing that song, but Tom asked me to, so I did.
Would you mind explaining that once more in a little more detail?
Didn\'t you know that Tom lived in Australia when he was a child?
Didn\'t you know that Tom was going to be in Australia this week?
Tom and Mary need to learn to communicate with each other better.
Tom and Mary still make a lot of mistakes when they speak French.
Didn\'t you know that Tom was planning to go to Boston with Mary?
This airport has up to three hundred takeoffs and landings a day.
My children like to play on the swings in the park near my house.
No one has the right to tell me what kinds of clothes I can wear.
I wanted to help Tom understand what Mary was trying to tell him.
I was able to catch the last train because I walked very quickly.
Tom told me he was not at all interested in what Mary had to say.
Tom told me that he would like to go to the zoo with us tomorrow.
I think that I\'ll be able to solve the problem without any help.
Maybe it was stupid of me to think that Tom would really help us.
I could hear the sound of Tom\'s voice coming from the next room.
I don\'t think I can get you to understand how difficult that is.
